ValidationRule.description: The Cross Project Impact should be filled from status Consolidate: Level of Effort Complete onwards.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Consolidate: Level of Effort Complete'), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Consolidate: Submit for CCB Review'), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Approve: Approved to Deploy'), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Release: Design'), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Release: Build'), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Release: Test'), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Release: SIT'), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Release: UAT'), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Release: Build Production'), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Release: Test Production'), ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Close: Deployed')), ISBLANK( TEXT( Cross_Project_Impact__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select Yes/No if this requirement has any "Cross Project Impact".
